document_data.name: Prayer of Revenance
document_data.mainbody: The '''prayer of revenance''' was a special ritual performed by specialty [[priest]]s of [[Hoar]] called [[doombringer]]s.
document_data.Activities: If present at the death of someone who begged for vengeance against their killer, a doombringer could enact the prayer of revenance ritual so that the victim would rise after their death as a [[revenant]], allowing them to seek out the revenge they craved in life.
